attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app just to keep up with politics bc Iâ€™m currently in a gov class and it is genuinely something that interested me...but then things took a turn for the worst. Not only did it take days to download but it also took up so much storage on my phone that I could t have it with all my other essential apps such as life360ğŸ’ğŸ§šğŸ»ğŸ’ğŸ§šğŸ» and without having to delete many of my most treasured photos and all to just have a little bit of better access to the news. It was 100% not worth it and I will surely be deleting it right after I submit this review and I hope you all do the same after reading it.

attributes.title: absolutely HORRENDOUS!!!!
attributes.review: hello. i am a very avid supporter of donald trump. this app does NOT do the good man justice. it took several DAYS (not minutes or hours, DAYS) to download and install onto my cellphone. after the several DAYS it took to download, it hacked my phone and stole all of my data, and im HORRIFIED! i do not believe donald trump (the great man he is, trump 2020) would stand for such a terrible app! this terrible cellphone application does dirty to the poor mans name. im so angry and upset over this app that i came here to write a review. im disgusted, horrified and, most importantly, worried. worried for what is to come with all my data and all the other users data. this is scary and i will not stand for it, and neither will mr trump! god bless america!

attributes.title: Donâ€™t download

I have perfectly good WiFi. 2, it wouldnâ€™t let me go on the App for 5 days after download!!! 3, LASTLY!!! It took up so much storage!! My phone has been acting insanely slow ever since getting it! Iâ€™ve also gotten text and emails from random people. This is disgusting how they use this app to exspose you. Also I have gotten a package at my door threating to hurt my family.

attributes.title: Very contagious
attributes.review: I am absolutely disgusted by this app! I have been hospitalised for nearly 5000 years because of the unsanitary aesthetic of this app. I have always been a healthy cannabis, I never got sick EVER and now ITS MY LIFE. This app gave me 15 common stds, 2 very rare stds and 78 NEVER SEEN BEFORE ONES!!!! UGH!!!! It also caused me to have 176 organ transplants, completely changed my blood type and caused me to have my ears pierced 49 times over and over becuase the holes kept closing up as I couldnâ€™t wear them in surgery. I never knew a FREE APP would end up costing me this much money. I hope that any of you who downloaded it did not catch any of these things and I will be sueing for full custody of the beesâ¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸
